CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** The value of this field will be used to restrict the number of times a customer can access a downloadable file via the API. Valid for "Is Downloadable" Items. Required when "Restrict Number of Downloads" is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** The value of this field will be used to restrict the number of times a customer can access a downloadable file via the API. Valid for "Is Downloadable" Items. Required when "Restrict Number of Downloads" is checked.
CustomField.label: Maximum Number of Downloads
